Summarize the article about the benefits of learning a new language. Article: Learning a new language can be one of the most rewarding experiences of a person’s life. Not only does it open up a world of possibility for global travel, but it also provides an incredible opportunity for personal growth and understanding of other cultures. It can also unlock features of our own language that we didn't know existed.

Its effects can be seen in changing weather patterns, shifting temperatures, and an increase in extreme weather events. It has been caused by human activity and will only become worse unless immediate action is taken.
